v8:item.v8:content: Own company for which the opening balance is entered

Volume of the products (works) for calculating depreciation in physical units.
Accrued depreciation while entering opening balance
Department to the expenses of which the depreciation will be allocated
Warehouse or department where inventory balance should be recorded
The cell for which inventory balance is being recorded
In this field, specify products item
If necessary, specify the characteristic of products item in this field
If it is necessary, the batch of products item is specified in the field
Unit of measurement of products item is specified in the field
Products item quantity in the basic (accounting) unit of measure
Sales order according to which warehouse stock is entered
Link ID of the Goods tabular section row and Discounts (mark-ups) tabular section row. Generated automatically, cannot be edited by user.
Opening balance of direct costs in unfinished production
Specify a department in the field
Specify attribution account of expenses in the field
Specify order to which expenses are recorded in the field
Amount of expenses in the presentation currency
Document currency selected from the "Currencies" catalog. Change of currency causes automatic recalculation of prices in the document
Amount in the currency of bank or cash account
Used to specify the contract with counterparty
used to specify the counterparty's advance
Used to specify the counterparty order

Specified in case of payment against the certain account

Shows whether the amount is overspending

Used to specify the transaction posting kind: debit or credit
Used to specify the transaction posting account
Used to specify the transaction posting amount
Used to specify the transaction posting currency
